item.title: What is PIA's MACE feature - TechRadar
item.description:
What is PIA's MACE feature

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: TechRadar

The article explores MACE, a built-in ad blocker feature from Private Internet Access (PIA). MACE operates at the DNS level, blocking ads, trackers, and malware before they reach your device, providing enhanced privacy and resource efficiency.

  • MACE is an integrated ad, tracker, and malware blocker from PIA.
  • It operates at the DNS level, blocking unwanted content proactively.
  • The feature is beneficial for privacy, reducing ads, and protecting against malware.
  • MACE is available on most PIA client apps, except for Android due to Google‚Äôs restrictions.
  • Enabling MACE is a straightforward process within the PIA app settings.

Remember, MACE isn‚Äôt a comprehensive malware solution on its own and can‚Äôt replace an anti-virus engine.

MACE is a valuable addition to your security toolkit, working alongside other ad-blocking solutions, though it has limitations regarding its static blocklist and malware detection capabilities.

item.title: For hassled homebuyers, an additional layer of protection from delays, hidden charges, substandard construction | Mint - Mint
item.description:
For hassled homebuyers, an additional layer of protection from delays, hidden charges, substandard construction

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Mint

In response to concerns regarding construction delays, hidden charges, and substandard quality in apartment sales, India's consumer protection agency is stepping in to assist homebuyers.

  • The Central Consumer Protection Authority (CCPA) is set to collaborate with the Real Estate Regulatory Authority (Rera).
  • This partnership aims to help homebuyers file complaints and seek compensation.
  • CCPA will assist in addressing unfair contracts with developers.
‚ÄúThe collaboration will empower consumers to fight against unfair practices in the real estate sector.‚Äù

The initiative represents an important step in safeguarding consumer rights in the real estate market.

item.title: Why it‚Äôs time put personal style first | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Why it‚Äôs time put personal style first

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

In the evolving landscape of fashion, 'holistic dressing' emphasizes the importance of well-being and authenticity, urging consumers to focus on personal style amidst rapid industry changes.

  • The fashion industry is witnessing significant shifts with new appointments at major houses.
  • Consumers are increasingly seeking authenticity in their fashion choices.
  • The trend of 'holistic dressing' is emerging as a response to the chaotic trends of recent years.
"It‚Äôs time for the consumer to put personal style first."

This transformation in fashion indicates a deeper desire for meaningful consumption and individuality among consumers.

item.title: Flipkart puts all iPhones on sale: iPhone 16 at Rs 63,999, iPhone 14 at Rs 46,999 ‚Äî top deals - The Financial Express
item.description:
Flipkart Offers Major Discounts on iPhones in 2025 Republic Day Sale

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Financial Express

Flipkart is set to launch its Republic Day Monumental sale on January 14, 2025, with early access for Plus and VIP members starting January 13. All iPhones will be discounted during this sale.

  • The iPhone 16 will be available for Rs 63,999, down from Rs 79,900.
  • The iPhone 16 Plus will drop to Rs 73,999 from Rs 89,900.
  • Pro models will also see discounts: iPhone 16 Pro for Rs 1,02,900 (down from Rs 1,19,900) and iPhone 16 Pro Max for Rs 1,27,900 (down from Rs 1,44,900).
  • iPhone 15 prices will start at Rs 55,999 and iPhone 14 at Rs 46,999.
  • The sale runs until January 19, 2025.
‚ÄúFlipkart is promising the greatest deal on the iPhone 16.‚Äù

This sale presents an opportunity for customers to purchase iPhones at significantly reduced prices, especially with additional bank offers and exchange bonuses available.

item.title: I've spent 10 years with Apple Watch, and after 10 minutes with the Galaxy Watch Ultra, I can't believe Samsung skipped this feature - TechRadar
item.description:
I've spent 10 years with Apple Watch, and after 10 minutes with the Galaxy Watch Ultra, I can't believe Samsung skipped‚Ä¶

Date: Not specified | Source: TechRadar

After years of using the Apple Watch and launching into the Android market with the Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra, the author realizes the importance of features like the digital crown that are absent from the Samsung watch.

  • Extensive experience with Apple Watch since its 2014 launch.
  • Amazed at the absence of the digital crown in the Galaxy Watch Ultra after trying it for just 10 minutes.
  • Notes functionality differences between the Apple Watch and Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra, particularly in outdoor and activity settings.
  • Recommends that future versions of Samsung watches include a digital crown for improved user experience.
"The lack of a digital crown has made me question everything I thought I knew about smartwatches."

The Galaxy Watch Ultra is a strong contender in the smartwatch market but its missing digital crown poses a significant usability issue for those coming from Apple devices.

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra: Everything we know so far about Samsung‚Äôs next flagship smartphone - The Indian Express
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra: Everything We Know So Far About Samsung‚Äôs Next Flagship Smartphone

Publication Date: January 19, 2025

Source: Indian Express

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is set to launch on January 22, 2025, and is rumored to feature incremental updates over its predecessor, including a new ultra-wide camera and a powerful processor.

  • Maintains similar design with minor tweaks, including a boxier shape and improved brightness on a 6.9-inch display.
  • Quad-camera setup with upgraded 50 MP ultra-wide lens; retains 200 MP primary and 10 MP telephoto lenses.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite, with options for up to 1 TB storage and 12 GB RAM.
  • Ships with Android 15-based OneUI 7 and promises seven years of updates.
  • Includes a 5,000 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
  • Expected pricing between Rs 1,20,000 to Rs 1,30,000.
"Samsung seems to be playing it safe when it comes to battery and fast charging."

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is poised to be a strong contender in the premium smartphone market, building on the solid foundation of its forerunners.

item.title: Exclusive! Gashmeer Mahajani says he is not 'desperate' to crack Hindi movies - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Exclusive! Gashmeer Mahajani says he is not 'desperate' to crack Hindi movies

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Gashmeer Mahajani, a popular Marathi actor, expresses that he is not in a rush to enter Bollywood. He is content with his existing audience in Maharashtra and is waiting for the right Hindi project.

  • Gashmeer is focused on his work in Marathi films and OTT shows.
  • He emphasizes the importance of timing in his career decisions.
  • He does not view himself as a typical television actor and has limited his exposure.
  • While he remains open to television, he prefers longer commitments of 80 to 100 episodes.
  • He mentions a missed opportunity in the show Katha Ankahee, which he feels would have suited him well.
‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt rush into things; you have to wait for the right time.‚Äù

In conclusion, Gashmeer Mahajani is taking a strategic approach to his career, prioritizing quality over quantity in his projects.

item.title: AI Tackles the Sound Barrier - Hackster.io
item.description:
AI Tackles the Sound Barrier

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

This article discusses groundbreaking advancements in AI, focusing on a system developed by MIT's CSAIL that mimics sounds like humans do, enhancing communication through vocal imitations.

  • Researchers at MIT have created an AI system that can mimic human vocal sounds without prior training.
  • The system models the human vocal tract and can interpret and imitate various real-world sounds.
  • Three versions of the model were developed, improving upon human-like sound imitation.
  • Human judges preferred AI-generated imitations in many experiments, indicating great potential in sound design.
  • Despite limitations, such as struggling with certain consonants, this work paves the way for potential applications in creative fields.
‚ÄúGiven this success, the researchers hope that the model could enable future sound designers, musicians, and filmmakers to interact with computational systems in creative ways.‚Äù

The study of sound imitation could redefine communication with AI, impacting fields such as sound design and deeper language understanding.

item.title: Gadgets Weekly: Acer Nitro V series PCs and more - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Gadgets Weekly: Acer Nitro V series PCs and More

Publication Date: 12 January 2025, Source: Deccan Herald

This week's Gadgets Weekly features exciting new technology from major companies including Acer, Motorola, and HP, showcasing a range of personal computing devices and accessories launched during CES 2025.

  • Acer launched the Nitro V series gaming laptops powered by AMD Ryzen AI processors.
  • The new line includes Nitro V 17 AI, Nitro V 16 AI, and Nitro V 14 AI, priced between ‚Ç¨899 and ‚Ç¨1,299.
  • Cybersecurity firm McAfee introduced a Deepfake Detector tool to enhance content authenticity monitoring.
  • Motorola launched the Moto G05, a budget-friendly smartphone with a 6.67-inch display.
  • HP announced the sleek Omen 16 Max gaming laptop, featuring customizable RGB lighting and advanced cooling.
  • Lenovo showcased the Yoga Slim 9i, featuring a camera-under-display technology.
  • Asus revealed their new ROG Astral graphics cards designed for high-end gaming.
"The Nitro V series laptops can run all new Artificial Intelligence (AI)-powered applications smoothly and are more power efficient than traditional gaming laptops." - Acer Press Release

The article further explores various new launches from other tech giants like Samsung, Amazon, and Sennheiser, including their latest innovations in air conditioning, smart audio devices, and hearing protection technology.

item.title: New Audi S5 Drag Races BMW and AMG Rivals, It's Over in 12.5 Seconds - autoevolution
item.description:
New Audi S5 Drag Races BMW and AMG Rivals, It's Over in 12.5 Seconds

Date: October 2023 | Source: Autoevolution

The new Audi S5 takes on its rivals, the BMW M340i and the Mercedes-AMG C 43, in a drag race showcasing their performance capabilities.

  • The Audi S5 features 48-volt electrification.
  • The race results showed the BMW leading with a time of 12.5 seconds in the quarter mile.
  • The Audi S5 follows closely with a time of 12.8 seconds.
  • The Mercedes-AMG C 43 finishes just behind the S5.
  • Prices: The S5 retails for ¬£69,455, while the M340i starts at ¬£59,835.
‚ÄúDespite its weight, the Audi ran a very respectable 12.8-second quarter mile.‚Äù

This drag race demonstrates the competitive nature of these performance vehicles, highlighting not only their speed but also their braking capabilities and weight factors.

item.description:

The OnePlus 13 has launched globally with a new variant, the 13R, set for release next week. The company offers discounts on the flagship model while announcing commitment to software updates.

  • The Red Magic 10 Pro is also launching, aimed at gaming enthusiasts.
  • Lenovo has introduced the Legion Go S, a handheld console.

This launch event marks key updates in the phone market, emphasizing value for money and new gaming technologies.

item.title: 10 Best TVs under 15,000 to buy in 2025 for budget-friendly smart entertainment - The Economic Times
item.description:
10 Best TVs under 15,000 to Buy in 2025 for Budget-Friendly Smart Entertainment

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Economic Times

Finding the best TVs under 15,000 doesn't mean compromising on quality or features. With brands like LG, Redmi, and Acer offering a range of options, you can enjoy a premium viewing experience without breaking the bank.

  • Premium viewing experience without high costs.
  • Smart TV capabilities with HD and Full HD resolutions.
  • Advanced audio features like Dolby Audio and DTS Virtual:X.
  • Multiple connectivity options including Wi-Fi and HDMI.
  • Ideal for diverse viewing preferences: movies, gaming, etc.
‚ÄúThese affordable yet feature-packed smart TVs come equipped with HD and Full HD resolutions along with popular streaming app integrations.‚Äù

In conclusion, these top-rated smart TVs provide remarkable value for money, merging affordability with essential modern features for every home entertainment need.

item.title: This Week a new Samsung patent was published in Europe for future Rollable/Expandable Displays for Smartphones and Tablets - Patently Apple
item.description:
Samsung's New Patent for Rollable and Expandable Displays Unveiled

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Patently Apple

Samsung has published a patent for innovative rollable and expandable display technologies for smartphones and tablets, showcasing potential designs for the future of mobile devices.

  • New prototypes of smartphones and tablets with foldable and rollable displays are set to be introduced at CES 2025.
  • The World IP Office published the Samsung patent application detailing various methodologies for rollable displays.
  • The patent suggests electronic devices are evolving past traditional rectangular shapes into more versatile designs.
  • Seven engineers are credited with the invention, indicating a strong team behind the development.
  • Beyond smartphones and tablets, the patent mentions applications for other device categories including medical devices and wearables.
"Electronic devices deviate from a uniform rectangular shape and are gradually changed into various shapes."

The development of rollable and expandable displays by Samsung signifies a major advancement in mobile technology, promising more versatile and innovative device designs.
